CustomField.description: When checked, the Recurring Donation (Non-Skew) nightly job limits the number of Recurring Donations selected for recalculation by looking for recently updated Opportunities on those Donations. This helps to improve Customizable Rollup nightly job performance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the Recurring Donation (Non-Skew) nightly job limits the number of Recurring Donations selected for recalculation by looking for recently updated Opportunities on those Donations. This helps to improve Customizable Rollup nightly job performance.
CustomField.label: Incremental Recurring Donation Non-Skew
